医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新的脑刺激试验旨在改善 TBI 后的认知恢复辛辛那提大学的 Ishita Basu 表示，创伤性脑损伤 (TBI) 是美国年轻人死亡和残疾的主要原因，也是现代战争中最具破坏性的幸存者伤害。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/New-brain-stimulation-trial-aims-to-improve-cognitive-recovery-from-TBI.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/New-brain-stimulation-trial-aims-to-improve-cognitive-recovery-from-TBI.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a188ee98-1906-4615-b425-8bb772097fc3 Mon, 09 Dec 2024 08:58:21 -0500 New brain stimulation trial aims to improve cognitive recovery from TBI
突破性治疗提高了 B-ALL 儿童的生存率就在他四岁生日的前几天，圣地亚哥被诊断出患有 B 细胞急性淋巴细胞白血病 (B-ALL)，这是儿童中最常见的癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Breakthrough-treatment-improves-survival-rates-for-children-with-B-ALL.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Breakthrough-treatment-improves-survival-rates-for-children-with-B-ALL.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b6a2f5f2-9704-4e33-9891-bec5dcc57e48 Mon, 09 Dec 2024 08:53:48 -0500 Breakthrough treatment improves survival rates for children with B-ALL
巴西的开创性研究发现与胰腺癌的新遗传联系胰腺癌最近已被列入巴西国家癌症研究所（INCA）定期发布统计数据的疾病清单。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Pioneering-study-discovers-new-genic-links-to-pancreatic-cancer-in-Brazil.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Pioneering-study-discovers-new-genic-links-to-pancreatic-cancer-in-Brazil.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1676e020-b152-4000-9ef3-2f2bee7c9898 Mon, 09 Dec 2024 08:09:56 -0500 Pioneering study discovers new genetic links to pancreatic cancer in Brazil
(HPAI) H5N1 流感病毒的单一突变可能会增加人类传播风险美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 资助的新研究表明，目前在美国奶牛中传播的高致病性禽流感 (HPAI) H5N1 流感病毒表面的蛋白质的单一修饰可能会使其更容易在人类之间传播。并于今天发表在《科学》杂志上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Single-mutation-in-(HPAI)-H5N1-influenza-virus-could-increase- human-transmission-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Single-mutation-in-(HPAI)-H5N1-influenza-virus-could-increase- human-transmission-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c13832e4-b3fa-42b3-b0b6-95aa7e12fcbd Mon, 09 Dec 2024 08:04:26 -0500 Single mutation in (HPAI) H5N1 influenza virus could increase human transmission risk
两项研究显示新生儿基因筛查的潜力今天发表在《美国人类遗传学杂志》上的两项研究表明，新生儿基因组筛查有可能解决美国婴儿住院率和死亡率高的问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Two-studies-show-pottial-for-newborn-genic-screening.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Two-studies-show-pottial-for-newborn-genic-screening.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ecdf44c0-f0a1-497e-a66b-45966c44aad3 Mon, 09 Dec 2024 07:57:37 -0500 Two studies show potential for newborn genetic screening
老年人的资源正在不断扩大69 岁的杰夫·克罗姆雷 (Jeff Kromrey) 将在女儿下次来访时与她坐下来，向她展示如果他遇到意外的健康危机如何访问他的在线帐户。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Resources-are-expanding-for-older-adults-on-their-own.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Resources-are-expanding-for-older-adults-on-their-own.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b3656d3-8ac7-4167-ac50-e2698bda9e60 Mon, 09 Dec 2024 07:28:18 -0500 Resources are expanding for older adults on their own
加州官员退休后领导陷入困境的心理健康委员会加州资深公务员威尔·莱特伯恩 (Will Lightbourne) 接任该州心理健康委员会临时执行主任，此前该委员会的前任执行主任因利益冲突指控而辞职。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/California-official-comes-out-of-retirement-to-lead-troubled-mental-health-commission.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/California-official-comes-out-of-retirement-to-lead-troubled-mental-health-commission.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3a6bb017-5d18-4250-b9e6-d4d8fd30e8c2 Mon, 09 Dec 2024 07:26:58 -0500 California official comes out of retirement to lead troubled mental health commission
HIIT 的代谢益处能否持续？新研究探讨运动后糖尿病的可持续性研究人员调查了长时间停止训练后，高强度间歇训练引起的代谢益处是否持续或有所不同。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Can-HIITs-metabolic-benefits-last-New-study-explores-post-exercise-sustainability-in-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Can-HIITs-metabolic-benefits-last-New-study-explores-post-exercise-sustainability-in-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b733dae5-b30d-4725-b26b-d45e7df5b2c9 Mon, 09 Dec 2024 06:48:00 -0500 Can HIIT's metabolic benefits last? New study explores post-exercise sustainability in diabetes
工程免疫细胞可以改变自身免疫性疾病的治疗旨在舒缓的免疫细胞可以改善器官移植、1 型糖尿病和其他自身免疫性疾病的治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Engineered-immune-cells-could-transform-treatment-for-autoimmune-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Engineered-immune-cells-could-transform-treatment-for-autoimmune-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d5a60d51-299a-43b8-b1c9-d5fa9966e8d7 Mon, 09 Dec 2024 06:04:16 -0500 Engineered immune cells could transform treatment for autoimmune diseases
早期双侧卵巢切除术与阿尔茨海默病风险增加有关早期双侧卵巢切除术的女性面临更高的阿尔茨海默病风险，尤其是携带 APOE4 等位基因的女性；教育和激素治疗可以提供恢复力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Early-bilingual-oophorelection-linked-to-increased-Alzheimers-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Early-bilingual-oophorelection-linked-to-increased-Alzheimers-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b97b8d9b-cac5-44bc-afda-e16f68815c90 Mon, 09 Dec 2024 06:02:00 -0500 Early bilateral oophorectomy linked to increased Alzheimer's disease risk
